name: pul
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
short for polyurethane laminate: a type of material covered in a thin layer of plastic: PUL is very quick-drying. I made some nappy covers from PUL fabric I bought online.
More examplesFewer examplesStandard PUL is normally a good choice.PUL fabric can be used to make mattress covers.You can get sandwich PUL, which has three layers.
